en.content: The cliff seems to fold over you. Pain fades out as your consciousness slips away.

text.content: You have bled to death from your wounds after falling from the cliffs at Emberhead!
Why not try the adventure again? Different choices may change your story.

zh.content: 看来悬崖折断了你的身体。你逐渐感觉不到疼痛，意识渐渐远去。

text.content: 你跌下烬头村的悬崖后，因伤出血过多而死！
为何不重新尝试这次冒险呢？不同的选择可能会改变你的故事。
